title: Sugar-Free Chocolate Cake
description: A delicious, easy to bake chocolate cake that's ready in less than 5 hours
creator: baker213
directions: Preheat oven to 175 degrees C. Grease and lightly flour a large baking tray and set aside. Stir together flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt. Set aside.

In a large mixing bowl, beat the butter or margarine with an electric mixer on medium to high speed for about 30 seconds. Add sugar and beat until the mixture is well combined. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after adding each one. Beat in chocolate and vanilla. Add dry mixture and 1.25 cups of water alternately to beaten mixture, beating on low speed after each addition just until combined. Pour batter onto the baking tray.
Bake for 30 to 35 minutes or until a wooden toothpick comes out clean. Cool layer cakes on trays on wire racks for 10 minutes. Remove layer cakes from trays. Cool thoroughly on racks.

creator: Shane Devers
